Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Outdoor recreation - Great Britain
description: Presented by Heinz, this documentary suggests that boredom and juvenile delinquency can be alleviated by introducing young adults to the organised activities of the Boy Scouts and Girl Guides Associations. Shows a range of activities available including camping, orienteering, water sports and rock climbing. Also shows the various volunteer programs that these associations support.
